page.title: 01GOSPORT,SOUTH-WEST.
page.content: } Gosport is situated on the South Coast by the waters of the Solent between the large cities of{Portsmouth and{Southampton}.It is within easy access to both cities by motorways. There are also good rail and bus services,with a good passenger ferry providing a link with neighbouring Portsmouth.Essentially it is an urban area although there is a little light industry. {Rowner}and{Lee-on-the-Solent}are both parishes within the borough of{ {Gosport}.Lee-on-the-Solent is a twentieth century,seaside,residential development with limited tourist facilities.Locally the Ministry of Defence,shops and gravel quarrying provide employment.Rowner is mainly residential with a fairly high density of population.
